thread.title: Deadly crocodile caught floating down river with dog in jaws after killing it for dinner
thread.title_full: Deadly crocodile caught floating down river with dog in jaws after killing it for dinner

title: Deadly crocodile caught floating down river with dog in jaws after killing it for dinner
text:
Deadly crocodile caught floating down river with dog in jaws after killing it for dinner Deadly crocodile caught floating down river with dog in jaws after killing it for dinner TOURISTS were gobsmacked when they saw a killer crocodile swim past with a dead pet dog in its mouth in the waters of a local marina. / Published 6th February 2017 
The monster reptile was caught calmly cruising between boats and rocks when a crowd noticed something large in its jaws. 
On closer inspection it was revealed to be a dead pet dog. 
In an astonishing video – shown above – the crocodile floats through the water holding the neck of the lifeless pooch. 
VIRALHOG SAD: The dog lies lifeless in the jaws of the hungry killer crocodile 
With calculated calm in its eyes it sails through the waters looking for somewhere to enjoy its prey. 
The poor pet sports a red collar and is believed to belong to a local bike shop owner. 
The incident happened at Puerto Vallarta Marina, western Mexico. 
VIRALHOG CALM: The killer crocodile swims with the dead dog in its jaws 
"The crocodile kept the dog in tis mouth for ages, not moving at all," said New Zealander Tim Weston who filmed the event. 
The video has been watched over 400,000 times and viewers offered up shocked reactions ranging from "No, no, no, no!" to "So sinister. So sad." 
Crocodiles live on a fish diet but are ruthlessly territorial and will kill any creature it views to be trespassing.
